title: Yorick and Rylai's
body: Why don't his ghouls slow when you have Rylai's? It clearly says in the item description that minions slow by 20%, and yet his do not. Da fuq Rito?{{item:3116}}   {{item:3070}} {{champion:83}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: just one of many reasons not to play ap yorick

> [{quoted}](name=Cigarette420,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eVaqWqN5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-10T03:22:00.706+0000)
>
> just one of many reasons not to play ap yorick

It has more uses than for ap Yorick. It gives health, and should provide a constant slow without you having to be in range to hit them. Therefore making his ghouls deal more damage over time.
i think it only applies on magic damage
the real question is why get a ryalis when you could have anything else

> [{quoted}](name=lighning23,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eVaqWqN5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-10T03:31:07.556+0000)
>
> the real question is why get a ryalis when you could have anything else

" _**provide a constant slow without you having to be in range to hit them. Therefore making his ghouls deal more damage over time.**_"

> [{quoted}](name=Kiritootirik,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eVaqWqN5,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-09-10T03:35:14.690+0000)
>
> " _**provide a constant slow without you having to be in range to hit them. Therefore making his ghouls deal more damage over time.**_"

oooor you could just hit your e and the ghols will stick to them anyway. That might be easier

> [{quoted}](name=lighning23,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eVaqWqN5,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-09-10T03:38:32.903+0000)
>
> oooor you could just hit your e and the ghols will stick to them anyway. That might be easier

Good luck landing that on anyone paying attention.

> [{quoted}](name=Kiritootirik,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eVaqWqN5,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-10T03:42:21.670+0000)
>
> Good luck landing that on anyone paying attention.

Yoricks e is the only reason your ghouls are able to get on someone that isnt afk ryalis wont help if your ghouls never get on them in the first place

We need an off meta Yorick build.

For more entertainment. 

But seriously though he does have other options, but don't say he's supposed to deal with Rylais not slowing his targets especially When Rylais says it's going to. 

Riot should fix it asap.
